html: The nations of the world receive warning that Jehovah’s Day of Judgment is at hand, that they have but a brief time in which to repent. Jehovah has “doomed” or “cursed” them (hehrim )—all who fail to attain the Zion/Jerusalem category of his people before time runs out. Jehovah will vent upon them his rage and fury —the king of Assyria/Babylon—“him who with unerring blows struck down the nations in anger, who subdued peoples in his wrath by relentless oppression” (Isaiah 14:6 ). As Jehovah’s instrument of destruction, he causes the nations’ slaughter —a term that he typifies (Isaiah 65:12 ).
